name: Fly Thru Take Flight
description:
Fly Thru Take Flight  is a strategy game where you fly around and try to go through hoops each bird you can play as has their own bonus and negatives depending on your playstyle

Red Bird

Greater Control

Yellow Bird 

Most Speed

Pink Bird

Greatest Turn Angle

Yellow And Pink Bird

Slowest and easiest to control

Movement:

W,A,S,D

Arrow Keys

Mouse

Lives:

You start the game with three lives these go down when you make a mistake

Credits:
